title: Man with Pipe
provenance_text:
Possibly with Herwarth Walden [1879-1941], Berlin, until 1919; Paul Citroen [1896-1983], 1919 until 1929? [1]; Possibly with Neumann & Nierendorf Gallery, Berlin, Germany, by 1929 [2]. G. David Thompson [1899-1965], Pittsburgh, PA, by 1946 until 1953 [3]; gift to Museum, April 1953. 

Notes:
[1]. Citroen lent this painting, recorded as Der Raucher, to Schlossmuseum, Weimar, Germany, from 1923 until c.1930.  [2]. From Paul Citroen. 
[3]. G. D. Thompson lent the painting to the Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute in 1946, per Annual Report.

Updated and Under review by CGK.

creator.birth_place: Nantes (Loire-Atlantique, Pays de la Loire, France)
